Nightlight:::

Nightlight felt as if all arround her dissapeared and the time froze. 
She only wished that that time never ended, she huged him as if she 
tried to retain him and didn't let him go.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> : : Rodimus Prime : ;
> 
> Rodimus looks very depressed.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: I know, I guess I better go.
> 
> Rodimus gets up and starts to walk to the disturbance but he stops 
and turns around. He places his hands on Nightlight's cheeks and 
moves in. He gives Nightlight a long, deep, passionate kiss...
> 
> OOC: Scratch what I said, I'll be on for a little bit longer.
